segments.text: I have to do some shopping .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you going to look for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm trying to buy a new bedroom set .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What store are you going to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have no idea where to find one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like me to tell you where I got mine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I went to get mine from IKEA .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is the furniture at IKEA cheap ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're not cheap , but neither is their furniture .
segments.speaker: S2
